title: Sponge
content: SPONGE MATERIALS CUSTOM CONVERTED TO YOUR SPECIFICATIONS â€“ GASKETS, SEALS, PADS AND MOREUsing the highest quality Sponge materials, SRP custom fabricates products for Gasketing, Cushioning, Sealing, Shock Absorption, and Vibration Control. From applications requiring a simple gasket, to heat shielding, insulating, chemical resistance, weather resistance, you name it, we have a solution for your product. We also provide laminating and slitting technologies to make your product better performing and more efficient. SRP: Building Relationships through Converting Solutions Since 1951We provide our customers with everything from material sampling and product prototyping to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery. We provide value to our customers by delivering exceptional customer service, engineering solutions, and quality products to meet their every need.
description: SRP converts a variety of sponge materials into custom gaskets, seals and pads for a variety of industries and applications.

seo.title: Sponge
seo.description: SRP converts a variety of sponge materials into custom gaskets, seals and pads for a variety of industries and applications.

gaskets.title: Closed Cell Sponge Rubber Gaskets
gaskets.content: SRP has been providing custom converted closed cell sponge rubber gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. Closed cell sponge rubber material formulations include EPDM, ECH (Epichlorohydrin), EPDM/CR/SBR blend, NBR/PVC, and Neoprene (CR) based.
gaskets.description: SRP has been providing closed cell sponge rubber gaskets, pads and seals to a variety of industries since 1951.

gaskets.title: Griswold Open Cell Sponge
gaskets.content: Rogers offers a wide range of Griswold open cell, natural cellular rubber products. Used worldwide in a variety of applications from apparel, footwear, industrial matting, and other specialty promotional items.  From comfort to surface protection, Griswold Natural Rubber products are a natural choice for designers.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter of KUSHON Sponge. SRP has been providing custom converted products to various industries since 1951.
